alert.note: Alert for Adams; Allen (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 9:01PM EST until March 10 at 1:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana...Ohio... Saint Marys River near Decatur affecting Allen IN, Van Wert and Adams Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saint Marys River near Decatur. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.5 feet, County road 225 north of Pleasant Mills is flooded. Agricultural land flooding increases in northern... central and eastern Adams County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM EST Monday the stage was 16.6 feet and slowly rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 17.6 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
